Bluetooth 5.4, A2DP, LE | water_resist = IP68 | other = | sar = | hac = | website = * {{URL|https://www.mi.com/xiaomi-14/}} * {{URL| https://www.mi.com/xiaomi-14-pro/}} | references = {{cite web |url= https://www.gsmarena.com/xiaomi_14-12626.php|title= Xiaomi 14|last= |first= |date= 1 November 2023|website= GSMArena|publisher= |access-date= |quote=}}{{cite web |url= https://www.gsmarena.com/xiaomi_14_pro-12643.php|title= Xiaomi 14 Pro|last= |first= |date= 1 November 2023|website= GSMArena|publisher= |access-date= |quote=}} }} The '''Xiaomi 14''' is a series of [[Android (operating system)|Android]]-based [[smartphone]]s manufactured by [[Xiaomi]] succeeding the [[Xiaomi 13]] series. Xiaomi 14 and 14 Pro, the first phones to feature [[Qualcomm Snapdragon]] 8 Gen 3 [[System On Chip]],{{cite web |url= https://indianexpress.com/article/technology/tech-news-technology/snapdragon-8-gen-3-soc-powered-smartphones-8998475/|title= From OnePlus 12 to Xiaomi 14: Smartphones confirmed to feature Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC|last= |first= |date= 1 November 2023|website=|publisher= |access-date= |quote=}} were announced on 26 Oct 2023 and were released in [[China]] on 1 Nov 2023.
